(A G1 bot is pure mechanical. No need for oxygen in thier systems. A 
BW bot has biotechno parts.  So I would say there is enough eveidence 
to support the theory that Beast Wars and Beast Machines need air to 
oxygenate the bio portion of thier bodies.  Living things need 
oxygen. Hence BW may need to breath. But they may not have to breath 
like humans.  So instead taking a breath every 5 seconds, it may be 
that they have to breath every 30 seconds or something like that.  On 
the show, when they ar running, they breath harder.  So they must be 
breathing, but I would have no idea what the ratio is for them.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (G1 and G2 Transformers didn't need to breath.  I know that, 
because they 
> were in space before and made no comments about it.  
> 
>     Though, in the TF:TM (Transformers: The Movie), Galvatron tried 
killing 
> Hot Rod via choking...but I think that was just kind of a mistake.
> 
>     Beast Wars though, is, well, different.  They make sounds like 
they do.  
> But I don't know.  Maybe the Beast Warriors needed to breath oxygen 
to 
> oxygenize their mech-fluid?  Can't say for sure.  Hope that just 
didn't make 
> more questions)
> 
> 
> Lord Unitron
> KSLawDogg
> Making a better tomorrow, for himself
